name: EditMode
desc: A mode that indicates whether the user can edit a view’s content.

items.name: case active
items.desc: The user can edit the view content.

items.name: case inactive
items.desc: The user can’t edit the view content.

items.name: case transient
items.desc: The view is in a temporary edit mode.

items.name: var isEditing: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether a view is being edited.

items.name: static func == (EditMode, EditMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two edit modes are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two edit modes are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the edit mode by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the edit mode.
